site_name: 130 - 132 WOOLWICH CHURCH STREET, WOOLWICH, LONDON, SE18 5NQ
description: An application submitted under Section 73 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990 for a minor material amendment in connection with the planning permission dated 14/07/2023 (Reference: 23/1123/F) for Change of use of no. 130 Woolwich Church Street from Learning Centre (Use Class F1(a)) to Restaurant (Use Class E), change of use of no. 132 Woolwich Church Street from Takeaway (Use Class Sui Generis) to Restaurant (Use Class E), internal amalgamation of both units to form one unit and new shopfront including additional glazing  to allow:- Vary Condition 5 Opening Hours from 12pm - 11pm Monday to Sunday to Monday - Wednesday from√ø12:00 - 00:00, Thursday from12:00 - 01:00 the following day and Friday - Sunday 13:00 - 02:00 each following day.
